author: Nicole Gallucci
title: John Krasinski's Some Good News Twitter account will brighten your timeline
description: Each day in the coronavirus era seems to bring forth a whole new avalanche of distressing news. It can be extremely difficult to stay positive and remember that there's good in the world during troubling times, so John Krasinski made it his mission to help re…
